name: Collect Points: Match the Dots
description:
A simple and extremely addictive game! A great game to relax at the end of the day.

Connect as many points of the same color.
Dial setting the number of dots for a certain number of moves.
You can use bombs, permutations and remove a point to progress in the game.

Depending on the progress of the game, the number of bombs and remove a point will increase.

Good luck :)
